00003 std::string Shader::LoadShaderFile(std::string filePath)
00004 {
00005         std::ifstream fin(filePath.c_str());
00006 
00007         if ( !fin )
00008                 return "";
00009 
00010         std::string strLine = "";
00011         std::string strText = "";
00012 
00013         while ( getline(fin, strLine) )
00014         {
00015                 strText = strText + "\n" + strLine;
00016         }
00017         fin.close();
00018 
00019         return strText;
00020 }
00021 
00022 void Shader::Initialize(std::string strVertexFile, std::string strFragmentFile)
00023 {
00024         std::string vShaderStr, fShaderStr;
00025 
00026         if ( !strVertexFile.length() || !strFragmentFile.length() )
00027                 return;
00028 
00029         if ( m_vertexShaderId || m_fragmentShaderId || m_shaderProgramId )
00030                 Destroy();
00031 
00032         GLenum ErrorCheckValue = glGetError();
00033 
00034         // Assign VS and FS ids
00035         m_vertexShaderId = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
00036         m_fragmentShaderId = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
00037 
00038         vShaderStr = strVertexFile.c_str();
00039         fShaderStr = strFragmentFile.c_str();
00040 
00041         const char *szVShader = vShaderStr.c_str();
00042         const char *szFShader = fShaderStr.c_str();
00043 
00044         glShaderSource(m_vertexShaderId, 1, &szVShader, nullptr);
00045         glShaderSource(m_fragmentShaderId, 1, &szFShader, nullptr);
00046         
00047         // Compile shaders
00048         glCompileShader(m_vertexShaderId);
00049         glCompileShader(m_fragmentShaderId);
00050 
00051         // Create shader program
00052         m_shaderProgramId = glCreateProgram();
00053 
00054         // Attach shdaers to program
00055         glAttachShader(m_shaderProgramId, m_vertexShaderId);
00056         glAttachShader(m_shaderProgramId, m_fragmentShaderId);
00057 
00058         // Link our program with OpenGL
00059         glLinkProgram(m_shaderProgramId);
00060 
00061         ErrorCheckValue = glGetError();
00062 
00063         if ( ErrorCheckValue != GL_NO_ERROR )
00064         {
00065                 std::cout << "ERROR: Could not create the shader program with error Id: " << ErrorCheckValue << std::endl;
00066                 exit(-1);
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 GLint Shader::GetVariable(std::string strVariable)
00071 {
00072         if(!m_shaderProgramId)
00073                 return -1;
00074 
00075         return glGetUniformLocation(m_shaderProgramId, strVariable.c_str());
00076 }
00077 
00078 void Shader::Destroy()
00079 {
00080         if(m_vertexShaderId)
00081         {
00082                 glDetachShader(m_shaderProgramId, m_vertexShaderId);
00083                 glDeleteShader(m_vertexShaderId);
00084                 m_vertexShaderId = 0;
00085         }
00086 
00087         if(m_fragmentShaderId)
00088         {
00089                 glDetachShader(m_shaderProgramId, m_fragmentShaderId);
00090                 glDeleteShader(m_fragmentShaderId);
00091                 m_fragmentShaderId = 0;
00092         }
00093 
00094         if(m_shaderProgramId)
00095         {
00096                 glDeleteShader(m_shaderProgramId);
00097                 m_shaderProgramId = 0;
00098         }
00099 }
